website_summaries.verdict: Only requires a little bit of this pre-shave oil to receive the benefits you’re seeking.
pros: Delivers protection to the skin while shaving to help those with sensitive skin issues
Also works as a skin moisturizer
Simplifies shaving tough beards by softening the facial hair
Helps eliminate the pain of ingrown hairs
cons: Has a thin texture that some people will not like

customer_reviews.title: Purchased at $16
customer_reviews.text: $16 was the price when i got this. Im a barber and use it for shaves about 0-5 shaves a week. This lasted almost two months. I use a nickel size in my palm for each client every client It says two ounces. I wish there was more. My only complaint is at the new price it no longer feels right to buy. I dont understand why preshave has to be so expensive for a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: Lubricates the skin beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using Shave Secret for a number of years & refused to use shaving cream. We always bought it at our local Walmart & they stopped carrying it for whatever reason. So, I started searching Amazon & found several (including Shave Secret). I wasn't sure which one to purchase, so I left it up to my husband. He chose this one & LOVES it! Said it is so much better than what he had been using & he will never return to Shave Secret. Much bigger bottle too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A must for almost daily shaving
customer_reviews.text: I shave in the shower and first use an apricot scrub. Next I apply a quarter sized amount of Shaveology Natural Pre Shave Oil and massage for about 30 seconds before applying my favorite Italian premium shave cream. The pre shave oil elevates the level of smoothness and comfort that cannot be beat. I've tried several varieties of pre shave oil (cost, curiosity,etc) but always end up a little bummed that the texture and fragrance is not like Shaveology. Give this Shaveology pre shave oil a try. If you have to shave almost everyday like I do, it's must for super smooth skin and reduced burn.
customer_reviews.author: Evan E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Used item not new
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the temper seal broken and about three spoons short of liquid to be full. It also came in a cheap plastic bag instead of the box it was pictured. It looks like someone opened and returned it without the original box and I got this handmedown. Not giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but container leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this brand, the product itself works great and i like th scent, the reason im giving 3stars is because the container leaks bad, i took this to my gym trip to shave after workout, and when i opened my bag a great amount of liquid spilled, also happened with the shaving cream so i had cream and oil all over my bag big disaster!! i cleaned and closed tight thinking that was the problem but no, they need to step up their game on containers.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre Shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other pre shave oils before and I have to say this ranks #1. It lifts my hair to give me a better shave and allows the smoothness of the razor to glide while I am shaving. I am using Shaveology's Shave cream and that is another review. I will continue to order Shaveology products going forward and I feel that I found my shaving product that I will use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Price and shipping were great tho.
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. Didn't notice a difference using it or not after washing my face and using a scrub. Was too hard to get oil off my hands to shave. Maybe I'm just not an oil person. Price and shipping were great tho.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Creates a closer shave
customer_reviews.text: Added this product to my shave routine to try and slow down my 5 o'clock shadow formation. It does allow me to get a closer shave and the scent is not overpowering at all. I paired it with Jack Black's shave cream and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Instantly improves Shaving experience!
customer_reviews.text: Pre-shave oil is a vital part of shaving. I have used pre-shave oil and a badger hair brush my whole life. This oil is without a doubt the best quality and bang for my buck of any pre-shave oil I have ever used. 100% recommend, I've used it for a couple years now and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best pre-shave oil I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I used Truefitt and Hll (better than AOS), and the Art of Shaving (not bad) pre-shave oil prior to this product. This product is the best pre-shave oil I have ever used. Having sensitive skin, it is important to have the best pre-shave products available. This is very thick, and a quarter's worth works wonderfully for each shave. Makes shaving easier and more enjoyable. Strongest possible recommendation. Try it. You will not be disappointed. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Leicaman

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this YEARS AGO!!
customer_reviews.text: I came across this product on Amazon and thought I would give it a try. I shave with a double edge razor and sometimes found shaving a little "rough". I started using this pre-shave oil and it seriously is a game changer. Shaving is very smooth now. I also don't seem to get those little red bumps anymore. Helps to provide a nice close shave without that abrasive feel. I don't shave without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: As good as expensive brands at a fraction of cost
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value pre-shave oil. It is unscented, which means it has no added fragrance. It has a natural, somewhat citrusy aroma. Just a few drops are sufficient for a good shave. The only negative is the lid - it is like a shampoo lid. Oil can drip down the side. I would prefer a lid that must be depressed, resulting in a squirt. Great value, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Texture
customer_reviews.text: I have a beard that grows in odd directions and needs serious preparation to get a close shave. This oil has the best viscosity of the beard oils I have tried. The fragrance is mild too. I just wish I could get it in bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: kindle customer

customer_reviews.title: Good oil not crazy about the bottle it comes in
customer_reviews.text: Oil works nice and is comparable to other oils I’ve used. My only issue was the bottle it comes in. When dispensing the oil it drips a little down the side of the bottle so I needed to wash the outside of the bottle occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: John F Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Good, thick pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed using this product, it does its job well. It's definitely pretty thick oil, It will leave a film on your hand that's fairly hard to get off. It's definitely thicker than the pre-shave oil I have used in the past. If you've got sensitive skin, I think this would be a great product for you because it does add a real layer of protection
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice preshave oil. Researched all the ingredients and found them to be safe and low on acne causing. Helps with the shave I use a brush and art of shaving's unscented soap. Will be continuing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chen

customer_reviews.title: this product costs less and performs better..
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the competition (specifically Art of Shaving), this product costs less and performs better because it isn't as "thick" as the Art of Shaving product....
customer_reviews.author: Sidney D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Shaveology line of products for two+ years and they are fantastic. They offer the closest, smoothest shave I've ever experienced and the after shave lotion smells great and leaves your face feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: KBH_MDriver

customer_reviews.title: A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby swears by this product. Tried in on a whim hoping to help with single blade shaving. It works wonders. Only using a small amount it goes a LONG way. For the amount you get the price is right compared to other products tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkplug

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few brands out there and still think this one is the best. I have sensitive skin and thick hair. This oil is a little richer, which actually makes for a smoother shave. Plus the smell is very good. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Polina Slavin

customer_reviews.title: Best Overall Product
customer_reviews.text: I have to shave daily and have tried many different combos of razors, pre-shave oil, shaving soap, etc. to avoid messy cuts, burn, and irritating in-grown hairs -- Shaveology's is the best pre-shave oil for performance that I know of. This pre-shave oil works and prevents most all of my shaving issues, regardless of the soap, razor, or whatever. I use Shaveology at home and on travel, and sorely miss it if I forget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this. It has certainly helped make for a better shave, and I enjoy the light, subtle, citrus notes in the scent. Fresh for a morning shave and is a great compliment, scent wise, to my shave cream- Taylor of Old Bond Street Eaton College.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heesch

customer_reviews.title: Great on the Head
customer_reviews.text: Great product to prevent razor burn on my head while ensuring a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. I have used this with and without shave gel. Combined provides a great shave, also works well as a stand alone with w few days of stubble.
customer_reviews.author: Ella S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great smell.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pre shave product! Unfortunately it seems they changed the composition recently as it used to smell very distinctly of grapefruit and now it is a more generic citrus smell. But still pleasant and very effective. Serves as a great lubricant for an electric shaver as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too watery and horrible bottle
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this bottle as it is a good price and has 2x as much as other pre-shave oils. The plastic bottle it terrible and since it is so watery, you cannot control how much you get. I actually open the bottle and just let the product lightly drip into my hand. It is cheap and smells good but other products are better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil definitely helps when shaving. I use other ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil definitely helps when shaving. I use other brands, as well. This one is very thick, and I actually have to wash my hands with soap after applying it to my face because I can't hang on to my Harry's razor. Not much scent, which is ok. This definitely helps with getting a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Better than shave cream
customer_reviews.text: Better than shave cream. Provides lubrication so the razor glides effortlessly across my face and head. Very nice scent also. After shaving, I don't even have to rinse my face as the oil acts as a skin softener and produces a nice glow. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roy LaBue

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive. Prone to breakouts and ingrown hairs. This stuff really helps. It does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Glass

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a pre-shave oil before this purchase. Since I am switching back, after a few decades, to a safety razor I decided to add the pre-shave oil to the regiment. It does seem to add to the comfort and closeness of the shave. I am satisfied with Shaveology's product and will probably purchase more even though I'll probably try a few other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Weston

customer_reviews.title: If you haven’t tried it, get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love prepping my skin with this before I shave. I’ve noticed fewer nicks, fewer razor bumps and softer skin.
customer_reviews.author: B Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Shaving!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell , and also the ease in shaving with this product
customer_reviews.author: Harper2000

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as description claimed. Noticeable difference when applying before applying shaving cream
customer_reviews.author: James Mc

customer_reviews.title: Fantstic with an added benefit....
customer_reviews.text: I've been a loyal user of this product for more than a year. I use it daily and love the way Shaveology Pre-Shave provides a super smooth shave and extends the life of the blades as well. I've tried others and found them to be too oily, too stinky or too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Z

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works
customer_reviews.text: Good value for this amount. Oil works just as well as my "Shave Secret" at a better price. Doesn't smell quite as good though.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: The Best you'll ever find so buy it, close your browser and wait by your doorstep for a great shave.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stuff! It provides a great shave, it smells great, and it will last you quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: TheHero

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a problem after shaving my neck, it, would be red.Since I have been using Natural shaving oil for men,it has not happened at all. A wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Best pre shave oil I’ve used and totally committed to this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pre shave oil! It’s the only one I’ve used that has prevented a lot nicks and skin abrasions on my skin when I shave
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: Enhances your shaving experience
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many preshave oils with my electric razor over the years. Shaveology’s Preshave oil is by far the best. The combination of oils, consistency, and scent make my shaving experience most enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: jkhummel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Just took up wet shaving last year and soon realized I needed to use a shave oil. Did a little research and decided to try Shaveology. Have not been dissapointed. Makes shaving more enjoyable, and love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: nndawson

customer_reviews.title: First Time Shaveology Product User Whom Would Purchase This Brand Again
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I found this pre-shave oil to be comfortable; it didn't irritate my extra-sensitive skin while creating a gentle buffer. Yes, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on market!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product..actually returning another brand of shave creme to orders theirs also!! Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cutolo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product !
customer_reviews.text: why i ever shaved without a pre-shave oil i wont ever know. This product is truly amazing and protects my skin from those really hard and close shaves. will be ordering more soon !
customer_reviews.author: trueblu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, easy to use bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great product, protects skin while shaving. The bottle is easy to use and doesn't unnecessarily waste product.
customer_reviews.author: el1668

customer_reviews.title: This shave oil has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: This shave oil has been great so far! I have been using the Art of Shaving lavender oil for a few years now but wanted to try something different. This oil is not as thick which I like because it spreads easier and and gives more lubrication than the AOS brand. Great scent too. I have sensitive skin and this is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product although not the cheapest. If you dig into the internet you can find a cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: C.F.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test out if it would help when I shave my head and I was blown away by how well it worked. Buying more as I write this. I really love the after shave balm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse T

customer_reviews.title: My Husband's Favorite Brand of Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: My husband has sensitive skin and has never been happy with any shaving creams or gels. This shave oil is perfect for him! And the scent is great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a pre-shave oil!
customer_reviews.text: Used pre-shave oils for years, and used to switch brands on amazon looking for best deal. I've stayed with the Shaveology as it works well and is priced right!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zdrojewski

customer_reviews.title: Best Pre-Shave Ever
customer_reviews.text: Shaveology’s pre-shave oil is the best I’ve ever used. It has a clean scent and gives a great close shave. And at half the price of other oils of equal quality, this is the best value out there.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: A shaving necessity
customer_reviews.text: I'm never shaving without this product. It nearly eliminates razor burn and nicks/cuts. Works the same as more expensive shave oils.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Vamvas

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pre-shave oil. Its has a very nice scent. My problem is the price. The bottle is small and and is pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The scent is ok. It does a good not great job. The problem with it is that it requires a large amount of product each use. More than the directions call for. For the price there are much better preshave oils out there.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It leaves my face feeling very smooth and soft after shaving, especially when used with the after-shave balm.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Dimin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: Shave my head daily. Have used both preshave oil and aftershave lotion. Both good products, great smell to the lotion. Highly recommend, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: michael madden

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a rockin' shave
customer_reviews.text: Decided to start shaving my head a couple of months ago. Found this product reccomended on a website for caring far a shaved head. Will never go without it!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shave oil.
customer_reviews.text: Nice consistency, scent is pleasant while not being too overpowering. Good value for the amount of product. This is my 3rd bottle. Would definitely recommend for both men and woman.
customer_reviews.author: Bouffy

customer_reviews.title: Shaveology pre shave oil review
customer_reviews.text: I always had issues with cuts while shaving or razor burn. Adding in shaveology pre shave oil has helped to cut down on this quite a bit and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle of this for $15 in Nov '18. It worked great and smelled wonderful. Then the price doubled... Would NOT buy it again for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used many brands of shave oil... this is hands down the best!!! It is thicker like some have said... use less, you don't need as much... great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brent W.

customer_reviews.title: Smoother shaving!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had started using a pre shave oil sooner, it makes a big difference. I'm a wet shaver and this product has become a regular part of my shaving ritual. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My fiance bought it for me and after every shave i thank her for buying it for me. Only feedback I'd give is the pre shave bottle could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The Pre-Shave Oil is key to the process and this product is awesome. It is a great value compared to other more expensive brands I have tried. You wont be disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I only buy this way now for almost everything!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my boyfriend and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Provides a very close shave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on price and couldn’t be more pleased with the close shave I get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like Kiehl's pre shave oil much better
customer_reviews.text: I like Kiehl's pre shave oil much better. I use a safety razor and this seems too think and clogs the razor a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: First time I've ever tried pre-shave oil. Noticed an improvement in skin irritation with the first use. Scent is refreshing. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Very close clean shave without burning or irritation for sensitive skin and coarse beard
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Solomonik

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This a great alternative to the much pricier options out there and works just as well, if not better. You don't need a lot of the oil to get the job done and it results in a good clean shave. I'd definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Good product I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it works but don't like the greasiness of it on my face,but it does make for a great shave.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always suffered from razor burn or irritated skin after shaving, this product has cooled my skin and made shaving comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good preshave. Not so good cap.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The bottle cap can be changed though. It pushes some out when closing the cap everytime.
customer_reviews.author: FCho

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this preshave oil. Nice scent and makes for a smooth shave. Turns my shave into a luxury experience.
customer_reviews.author: William Buttrum

customer_reviews.title: Love this pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this pre-shave oil! I've tried a few others but this one really stands out. Provides a smooth shaving experience. I will definitely be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pre-shave oils I’ve ever used. I have sensitive skin. This product works great at preventing razor burn.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Novak

customer_reviews.title: Shaveology pre-shave oil.
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking this Shaveology pre-shave oil. Nice scent, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre-shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: Excellent face conditioning as well as very good shaving lubrication. It has eliminated my razor burn completely.
customer_reviews.author: J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This product really adds to the ease of shaving and also has a pleasant smell. Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McEwan

customer_reviews.title: feels good
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the feel of this shave oil. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome ito has a orange smell but it was refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: No more razor burn
customer_reviews.text: Before use I was getting terrible razor burn on my head. No irritation at all since I started using.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pre-shave oil, it really makes your face feel smooth. Best product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre-Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great Pre Shave Oil nice light smell, Not to thin or thick and only need 4-6 drops so this will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My husband says its fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best product he ever used for shaving his head smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole kholi

customer_reviews.title: Best of shaving
customer_reviews.text: Great products and company. Truly reminiscent of the lost art of shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Radames

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well - smooth shave each time with no nicks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not for electric shavers. For blade shaving, eliminates nicks, rash etc, very well.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product/Bad Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, however the bottle top leaks if it is turned on it's side or upside down. Lost a good amount of the oil. It needs to be in a better bottle, unless mine was damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Shaveology Pre-Shave Oil makes for a smooth, comfortable shave. It has become an essential part of my daily shave.
customer_reviews.author: D. RATH

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he absolutely loves it!! He has never used Pre-Shave Oil before, but now he has to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Bedingfield

customer_reviews.title: I feel like it is thicker than others I have purchased and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is just ok. I feel like it is thicker than others I have purchased and I'm not fan of that.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the Brand Name
customer_reviews.text: I've tried shave oils off and on but the benefits always seem to fade. Is it possible for your face to "get used to" a certain shaving oil, cream, or lotion? That question may not be based on anything scientific, but it's been my experience. This pre-shave oil works well enough but I'm not sure it's all that great for the price. Seems like you're paying for the brand name more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Kleen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I get closer shaves with less passes when I use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Molinaro Jr

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra for art of shaving
customer_reviews.text: I've used art of shaving pre-shave oil for years. Tried this out since it's half the price, unfortunately it's not as good either. Great smell, but it's too thin/liquidy and doesn't offer the shave protection on the skin that art of shaving does.
customer_reviews.author: ShayneG

customer_reviews.title: It is usefully only for one pass. When you ...
customer_reviews.text: It is usefully only for one pass. When you reapply cream for a second and third pass the oil gets wiped and washed away. Not too thrilled with it. I shave without it more often then with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brewza

customer_reviews.title: and everything I read recommended that you apply a lubricant on prior to shaving
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I was new to shaving with a safety razor, and everything I read recommended that you apply a lubricant on prior to shaving. Well I did and it does make life a lot easier, I haven’t had any major nicks or cuts while using this product. With regards to it being non-scented, well in this case it is really non-scented, no smell what so ever. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: nidal hasan

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT like this.
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT like this ... not one bit. I followed the instructions and now have a "splotchy" beard. It shaved closed in some places ... not so much in others. And it ruined a brand new blade by gunking it up.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell T Williams

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: I am really picky about shave products, and when it comes to pre shave oil.....this is The Best on the market...pours easily, smells great, washes off your hands easily with no "film"...and the razor literally glides across your face...it is the best. As for customer service from the company....the owners literally want to stay in touch with you, and if there would be any problems...(there won't be)...they want to fix them right away. If you are in the market for shave products....with this company.....you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Main Monkey Business

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for the new shavers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I had horrible razor burn to the point where i thought i would have to stop using a DE. Once I tried this product I was amazed. I now have no razor rash or burn. One day i forgot to use this and I had horrible burn again. Took me a few minutes but I then realized I didn't use the oil. For anyone starting out shaving with a DE razor I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard1

product_meta.title: Natural Pre Shave Oil for Men – 2 Full OZ - Preshave Oil Protects and Hydrates Your Skin - Our Shave Oil Prevents Razor Burn, Rashes, Bumps and Ingrown Hairs - No Preservatives - for All Skin Types
feature_bullets: ✅ TRY RISK-FREE - 100% MONEY BACK LOVE YOUR SHAVE GUARANTEE: FEEL GREAT WITH OUR PRE SHAVE OIL OR YOUR MONEY BACK!! EVERY PURCHASE IS BACKED BY OUR 1 YEAR EMPTY BOTTLE GUARANTEE - If you are NOT FULLY SATISFIED WITH OUR SHAVE OIL for any reason we will refund your money no questions asked.

✅ PREP FOR THE PERFECT SHAVE: Achieve the best shave of your life with Pre Shave Oil, an integral part of the process for men looking to experience the best shave possible. Massage oil on to face to lock in moisture and protect skin during shaving

✅ PREMIUM PROTECTION FOR THE FACE: Our Premium Preshave Oil is made with Safflower Oil, Avocado Oil, Walnut Oil, Jojoba Oil, and Vitamin E to soothe and condition facial skin making hair stubble more accessible.
✅ VALUE MEETS CONVENIENCE: Our Pre-Shave Oil is a perfect size for travel but we didn’t skimp on our 2 oz bottle – A little goes a long way!
✅ A PERFECT COMPANION TO SHAVEOLOGY SAFETY RAZORS: Handcrafted and engineered to provide a close and consistent shave every time.
